alert.note: Alert for Clay; Dickinson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 29 at 5:54PM CDT until April 29 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Dickinson County in central Kansas... Southeastern Clay County in north central Kansas... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 553 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Abilene, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 550 PM CDT trained spotters reported half dollar size hail on the west side of Abilene. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Abilene, Wakefield, Moonlight and Talmage. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 272 and 280. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central and north central Kansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central and north central Kansas.
